description: This file contains a database migration class 'Init' for setting up the 'Notes' table in the database, including table creation, primary key, and index definitions.

classes.name: Init
classes.description: A migration class derived from Migration, responsible for creating and dropping the 'Notes' table during database schema updates.

methods.name: Up
methods.description: Defines the operations to apply this migration, creating the 'Notes' table and its index.

methods.name: Down
methods.description: Defines the operations to revert this migration, dropping the 'Notes' table.
